blog.name: autumnisuninteresting
blog.title: Autumn Is Uninteresting
blog.description: religiously listen to twenty-øne piløts, I like to make youtube videos, uhh I'm a big loser so there's that. I also love Dan and Phil so yeah :)

summary:
That's it, I'm going to say it.
I love Dan and Phil so much like they've helped me through the toughest times in my life and I...
body:
That’s it, I’m going to say it.

I love Dan and Phil so much like they’ve helped me through the toughest times in my life and I can’t ever thank them enough. We should really respect their privacy and stop coming up with rediculous theories. And stop harrassing Dan to upload, let him have his break. We all need breaks from things, that doesn’t mean it’s the end. Phil is providing us with lots of very good content and I’m so thankful for that because I love them both equally. Leave Dan alone about youtube, he’ll make a come back so strong it’ll send your Dannie asses into a coma. I’m off now, that’s all I had to say. Love you D Howell and P Lester if you see this.

We all need breaks from things, that doesn’t mean it’s the end. Phil is providing us with lots of very good content and I’m so thankful for that because I love them both equally. Leave Dan alone about youtube, he’ll make a come back so strong it’ll send your Dannie asses into a coma. I’m off now, that’s all I had to say. Love you D Howell and P Lester if you see this.

blog.name: proudofdaniel
blog.title: sam
blog.description: I’m proud of dan

summary: Click here to support Help Sam Heal from Lyme organized by Maggie Sale Ostara
body:
Please show this to you parents or even just share it on your story i need help. It would mean so much to me if you could help. Click the link in my bio

Sam was a bright, funny, quirky kid excelling in school and always full of creative projects. She was on the local swim team, and loved to dance and sing. Now she spends most of her time in bed with extreme exhaustion, brain-on-fire, and crippling anxiety. At this point, her world has gotten very small with most of what she cares about having been “taken away” from her, as she says.


She’s been sick and misdiagnosed for several years, with flare ups so severe that she couldn’t go to school or do homework or even leave her bed.

We now know that she has Lyme, Bartonella, Babesia, Ehrlichia (three co-infections of Lyme) plus toxic mold poisoning.

She is seriously sick!


the bacteria in her skin, and her extra weight is from mold. Please help us get her the care she needs so that she can get back to being the bright spirit she truly is.


We’ve already invested over $15,000 in her care over the last couple of years, and now her expenses are increasing dramatically as we continue to explore what works (nothing has much yet). She has health insurance, but none of her doctors’ appointments, tests or treatments are covered (except for some of her prescriptions). All of your donations will go to her treatments.


We so appreciate you giving today! We will send you updates as her healing journey unfolds

Click here to support Help Sam Heal from Lyme organized by Maggie Sale Ostara

blog.name: howellduh
blog.title: vote for me in 2040
blog.description: miranda! • 18 • dnp • it hits different

body:
here’s a PSA

it is so incredibly selfish to keep asking dan when he is going to upload. people need to realize just how much work it takes to make these videos and how rude it is to keep patronizing him over it- you say you value him and his mental health above everything else, so act like it.

for dan: take your time and upload when you’re ready- it’s selfish of people to keep pestering you about this because your happiness is so much more important to us than any video. so breathe and focus on yourself. make this break as however the hell long you want. we’ll be here when you’re ready. we love you.
